name: Clever Girl
description:
A time traveller crashes her time machine in prehistoric times and must retrieve the missing components that have become scattered across the landscape, with only a bow and arrow for protection.

Clever Girl is a twin-stick style shooter developed as a practice collaboration project over at the HobbyGameDev subreddit. It took five months to develop with team members working entirely for free and in their spare time.

It should take less than half an hour to play the entire game so give it a go and let us know what you think @StoneBakedGames. Thanks for playing!
